mazesolver.logic

Class IDA

  • java.lang.Object
    • mazesolver.logic.IDA

  • public class IDA
extends Object
    Offers implementation for an IDA pathfinding algorithm.
    Author:
    Marko Vainio

      • idaSolve

        public int idaSolve()
        The main algorithm which performs multiple Depth-First-Searches in the maze with different limitations.
        Returns:
        Returns the length of the shortest path nad -1 if one isn't found.
